directions: Combine broth, tomatoes, juice, and soup in a saucepan with a wire whisk over medium heat. Add sugar, spinach, nutmeg, and salt and pepper to taste, without thawing spinach. Allow to heat gently 20 minutes on medium-low until spinach is tender. Keep hot without letting it boil.
Add cooked pasta and cook for 10 minutes longer.
ingredients: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can tomato-vegetable juice cocktail
title: Tomato Florentine Soup I
